name: Mid-Atlantic Mayhem
description:
Warning : for some odd reason it will come up as dangerous file. Because its using pyinstaller to create.

This is me and my Friend's First game. Tip all assets and .exe must be in the same folder otherwise it will not run, it is arrows and wsad controlled. press 2 and 3 and you will find a secret.  Me and my friend had lots of fun since neither of us knew how to code pygame and now we do. check out my twitch and my friends at https://www.twitch.tv/impinpb https://www.twitch.tv/capz_gone
